markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bellflower Toolbelt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2308)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Different versions of the _bellflower toolbelt_ are customized to appear to suit specific trades, so a belt used for carpentry would look different from a belt for baking.

<document level="2" id="action-1856" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bellflower Toolbelt
